RelatedSentence: Prosecutors allege Whitaker opened fire on 10 vehicles from behind the wheel of his car in March and April in Kansas City , Blue Springs and Lee 's Summit .
Prosecutors allege Whitaker opened fire on 10 vehicles from behind the wheel of his car in March and April in Kansas City , Blue Springs and Lee 's Summit .
Investigators also suspected the same shooter in an incident in Leawood , Kansas , but Whitaker is charged only in Missouri incidents .
